Sentencas: This work evaluates the use of fine-grained yttrium-substituted strontium titanate powders for the preparation of planar anode supported solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Properties of tape-cast Y-substituted strontium titanate for planar anode substrates in SOFC applications

Sentencas: Starting from a submicron-sized powder of Y-substituted strontium titanate Sr0.895Y0.07TiO3 (SYT), which was synthesised via spray pyrolysis followed by a grinding process, suspensions of high solid concentration were prepared by steric stabilisation.
Titulo: Properties of tape-cast Y-substituted strontium titanate for planar anode substrates in SOFC applications

Sentencas: From these suspensions, tape casting slurries of up to 25 vol% were produced and further processed to ceramic green tapes using the doctor blade technique.
Titulo: Properties of tape-cast Y-substituted strontium titanate for planar anode substrates in SOFC applications

Sentencas: The rheological behaviour of the slurries was investigated in dependence on the content of solids and organic additives.
Titulo: Properties of tape-cast Y-substituted strontium titanate for planar anode substrates in SOFC applications

Sentencas: Furthermore, the binder burnout and sintering behaviour of the green sheets were characterised.
Titulo: Properties of tape-cast Y-substituted strontium titanate for planar anode substrates in SOFC applications

Sentencas: After firing, crack-free substrates of high planarity were obtained.
Titulo: Properties of tape-cast Y-substituted strontium titanate for planar anode substrates in SOFC applications

Sentencas: The achieved properties of the sintered tapes such as density, porosity, warping, mechanical strength, and electrical conductivity were determined in dependence on sintering temperature.
Titulo: Properties of tape-cast Y-substituted strontium titanate for planar anode substrates in SOFC applications
